comments.content: The good thing: With Sloop, SHOUTING looks even more stupid.

There will always be people who find ways to complain. My only complaint is that I don’t have the $$ to buy it.

Oh, and that nine styles might become unwieldy. Why not just one style with a lot of Opentype variants?

Peace,  
JT

Hang on Sloopy, Sloopy hang on!

JT,

There are lots of customers who just don’t do stylistic sets and the work involved is more than making several versions. I can understand the choice FB made.

ChrisL

Oh, and Paul, I am not complaining! Sloop is a beaut! :-P

\*shrugs\* it makes my profile say “it\_the\_ninja” though...never enough room for swashes...

Peace,

But this is a site where users can’t get to specify their own choice of text face.  
Pity.
